title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu
author: TonGerner
name: Left menu
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/"/> This plugin creates a fixed left menu with a shifted story-river (which assumes a widescreen monitor - otherwise is is not possible to display the left menu, the story river, and the sidebar together).
The tiddler $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/leftmenu-entries contains the left menu entries (transcluded in $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/leftmenu).
For an alternative left menu (no widescreen needed) see http://tw5topleft.tiddlyspot.com/ <<< ''Note:'' * This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/) * For more information about possible left menu entries see http://tw5topleft.tiddlyspot.com/ * To create more 'room' you can consider the 'Tight' theme <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''.
